content: a fabulous pattern for knitters that is inspired by the temperature of the day over the course of the year impress your community with this beautiful **shlanket** scarf/shawl/blanket that will create an heirloom for a lifetime if you are gauge - size is 40 x 66 w/out fringe **knit in the round-** **no weaving in ends** my favorite part this project is super easy to start late and easy to catch up- even if you procrastinate each month links are included to videos to assist even the most beginning knitter fabulous for knit-a- longs **gauge is not important ** this pattern can be modified very easily for any weight of yarn using smaller needles result in smaller shlanket every region will be different on amount of a certain color needed i needed 2 skeins for the purple and orange for mount shasta california link provided to track the weather past up to 30 days i keep a small notebook to keep track and sometimes went up to a month before i would catch up i have started a group called **shanti stitches** to share our progress stories and pictures please join me there https //www ravelry com/groups/shanti-stitches 1 i have uploaded 2 videos on to you-tube showing cutting the steek and unraveling the edge cutting the steek 2 unraveling the edges 3 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/shanti-stitches 2 https //youtu be/3qp2hwp_v4i 3 https //youtu be/rrdoa1iqm7w
